summary: This is an email chain from September 6, 2007, discussing logistics for an upcoming meeting with Jeffrey Epstein's legal team. The participants are coordinating FBI representation and confirming meeting times.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the legal case; his legal team is meeting with prosecutors/FBI.

events.title: Meeting with Epstein's legal team
events.description: A meeting is scheduled between prosecutors/FBI and Jeffrey Epstein's legal defense team.

keyFacts: An email chain dated September 6, 2007, coordinates a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein's legal team scheduled for the following day (Friday, September 7, 2007).
The FBI's presence at the meeting is discussed, with a suggestion to limit it to one representative.
The meeting with Epstein's team was planned to start at 2:00 PM, with a possible follow-up meeting among the prosecution/FBI team.
